title: Strengthening Leadership Competencies in Practice: Adaptive e-Learning Design for Personalized Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational secondary science knowledge and understanding of science concepts related to professional fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design at least three real-world problem-solving solutions by applying scientific concepts to professional fields.
Learners can complete at least two personalized learning modules per week using adaptive content delivered in mobile environments.
Learners can identify learning gaps through formative assessments, reflect on at least one weekly feedback, and revise their learning plans accordingly.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
